translation.product_desc1: We manufacture sturdy flatbeds tailored to your truck's dimensions. Perfect for transporting goods, they are designed to ease loading and optimize payload.
translation.product_desc2: We produce custom tarped flatbeds, offering optimal protection against bad weather. It‚Äôs the ideal solution for transporting sensitive goods while maintaining easy side or rear access.
translation.product_desc3: Our box bodies feature rigid sidewalls, providing full protection for your goods. They‚Äôre perfect for secure transport, with the option to add side doors or customized fittings.
translation.product_desc4: Our tippers are designed for transporting bulk products such as cereals, forage, or soil. Sturdy and functional, they fit all types of tractors and offer easy unloading.
translation.product_desc5: Our tipping dump bodies are designed for the transport and quick unloading of bulk materials such as rubble, sand, or soil. Equipped with robust hydraulic cylinders, they ensure safe tipping.
translation.product_desc6: Our tankers are designed for transporting liquid food products (water, milk, oils) or chemical products (acids, solvents, detergents). Made from stainless steel or compatible materials, with options for compartmentalization, specific valves, and easy cleaning.
translation.product_desc7: Our tankers are designed for transporting and distributing water and liquid fertilizers. Available in several capacities, they are robust and suited to the needs of farms and communities.
translation.service1_desc: We carry out laser cutting, custom parts, high precision on steel, stainless steel and aluminum, with an excellent finish.
translation.service2_desc: We carry out the bending of steel, stainless steel or aluminum sheets with precision thanks to our CNC presses.
translation.service3_desc: Our skilled welders ensure MIG, MAG and TIG welds adapted to the most demanding metal structures.
